attributes.action: award the whistleblower who exposed the climategate scandal a medal for services to the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In exposing the emails from the University of East Anglia in the so call climategate affair the whistleblower has shown the MMGW theory to be without substance, lacking in credibility and based on manipulated data. He or she should be decorated forthwith.

rejection.details: The Government is actively seeking nominations for honours. Please go to: http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Governmentcitizensandrights/UKgovernment/Honoursawardsandmedals/DG_067917
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
